sentences.en: Around 1840 the floor length skirt returned , but this time stiffened around the circumference by horsehair.
sentences.cn: 在叼840年前后,极地长裙再次流行, 只不过这次是采用马尾水支撑形状.

sentences.en: Horsehair is the part of the headwear covering the forehead Another ornament is the silver bell.
sentences.cn: 马鬃—戴在发箍前面覆盖额头的部分.

sentences.en: Now, go out about the town covered in the horsehair sheet holding the horse’s head up on a pike.
sentences.cn: 现在用长矛举着披着马毛床单的马头去游街吧。

sentences.en: Out came Meg, with gray horsehair hanging about her face, a red and black robe, a staff, and cabalistic signs upon her cloak.
sentences.cn: 梅格出来，脸上挂着灰色马鬃，身穿黑红二色长袍，手持拐杖，大衣上画着神秘符号。

sentences.en: Picture yourself in the 17 th century, looking sharp with a bundle horsehair on your head.
sentences.cn: 想像自己身处17世纪, 头上戴著马毛假发,一副精神抖擞的模样.

sentences.en: The differences, say the scientists, come from the way light bounces off horsehair.
sentences.cn: 科学家们认为，区别在于光经马毛反射的方式。

sentences.en: The English judiciary wear their traditional horsehair wigs.
sentences.cn: 那位英国法官戴着他们的传统马鬃假发.

trans.tran_en: the hair from a horse’s  mane  and tail, sometimes used to fill the inside of furniture
